author: brane
msg: Begin converting the Python tests to raise an exception on test
failure rather rhan returning an error code.
* svntest/__init__.py: (Failure): New. Base class for test failure exceptions.
SVNTreeIsNotDirectory): Derive from svntest.Failure instead of Excaption.
(Sandbox.build): Raise a Failure instead of returning an error code.
remove handler for SVNTreeUnequal. Add a check that prints a warning
* svnversion_tests.py: Convert to the exception model.
* prop_tests.py (prop_value_conversions): Convert to the exception model.

author: kfogel
msg: Get the old revprop value set up for post-revprop-change hook, but
don't actually send it to the hook yet, as we're still deciding the
value on hook's stdin.  Perhaps that comment was meant for
(svn_repos__hooks_post_revprop_change): Take old value as a param,
but don't do anything with it yet.
parameter to `new_value', to avoid confusion.  Remove redundant
consistency with definition; and fix a rather broken doc string.
